entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Clear Button on Entry when RTL is still broken #19481
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [iOS] ScrollView height not changing after items are hidden #19479
  • [iOS] RadioButton with custom ContentTemplate in ResourceDictionary does not respond to taps #19478
  • [Android] The measure and arrange methods are not being called in custom layout with ContentView #19471
  • [iOS] [MacCatalyst] Entry Text color not updated initially when updating text from code behind in .NET MAUI #19470
    Backlog
  • MAUI App bundle size is too large on release mode (second attempt) #19469
  • NET Maui app with none shell navigation bug #19480

Closed

  • API's for accessing drives(File System), Microphone, Camera, add or remove software's #19477
  • PlatformNotSupported exception on iOS Release build from DevOps pipeline #16025
  • Contacts API namespace conflicts on MacCatalyst and iOS #7421
    Backlog
  • View Following Cursor via PoitnerGesture Will Flicker In AbsoluteLayout #19330
    Backlog
  • App doesn't run App.xaml.cs after killing ForegroundService and reopening it #19453
  • [Windows] Unable to change color of SearchBar bottom line and selected flyout menu #19426
  • FontFamily is Not Recognized in UnPackaged WinUI App #19457
    Backlog
  • Views are not vertically centre when layout vertical layout option is set to centre #19464
  • Selected Visual States no longer work correctly #11238
    Backlog
  • [testing] Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18740
    .NET 8 SR2
  • XamlC ignores isError option in ObsoleteAttribute #18704
  • NSInvalidArgumentException in setCornerCurve #19467

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Clear Button size calculation #19482
  • [ci] Move to new compliance task #19475
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix TableView rendering on Android #19473
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #19472
    area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • XamlC WarnAsErrors. #19337
    area/Xaml </>

Updated

  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.3.3 #19394
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Devices.Sensors.Location: rework argument handling in constructors #19459
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Flyout layout #19125
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D8 #18760
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added appium UITest for FlyoutNavigationBetweenItemsWithNavigationStacks #19444
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add design time converters #19301
    area/Xaml </>
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Do not use underscores in the ApplicationId #19377
    area/templates 📄
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19454
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
